name: Dracula
description: The Lord of Wallachia. The final boss.

name: Bloody Skeleton
description: A skeleton covered in blood. It can regenerate if destroyed.

name: Bat
description: A common blood-sucking bat that lurks in the dark.

name: Stone Skull
description: A floating skull-shaped rock that is impervious to some attacks.

name: Zombie
description: The reanimated remains of those buried in the castle grounds.

name: Merman
description: A water-dwelling humanoid that leaps from the depths.

name: Skeleton
description: A basic skeletal warrior animated by dark magic.

name: Warg
description: A giant, ferocious wolf with incredible speed.

name: Bone Scimitar
description: A skeleton armed with a scimitar. More agile than the basic skeleton.

name: Merman (Fireball)
description: A more dangerous merman that can breathe fireballs.

name: Spittle Bone
description: A small skeleton that spits acidic bile.

name: Axe Knight
description: A heavily armored knight that throws powerful axes.

name: Bloody Zombie
description: A zombie drenched in blood, wielding a knife.

name: Slinger
description: A skeleton that hangs from the ceiling and slings projectiles.

name: Ouija Table
description: A possessed table that crushes those who approach it.

name: Skelerang
description: A skeleton expert in throwing boomerangs.

name: Thornweed
description: A mutant plant that shoots sharp thorns.

name: Gaibon
description: A winged demon that flies and spits fire.

name: Ghost
description: A wicked spirit that floats aimlessly.

name: Marionette
description: A puppet controlled by a demonic force.

name: Slogra
description: A demon bird knight equipped with a spear.

name: Diplocephalus
description: A two-headed dinosaur-like creature.

name: Flea Man
description: A small, hunchbacked creature that hops around erratically.

name: Medusa Head (Blue)
description: A floating head that turns victims to stone.

name: Blade Soldier
description: A skeleton armed with dual daggers.

name: Bone Musket
description: A skeleton equipped with a primitive musket rifle.

name: Medusa Head
description: A floating head that turns victims to stone.

name: Plate Lord
description: A massive armored knight wielding a heavy iron ball.

name: Stone Rose
description: A petrified mutant plant that attacks with thorns.

name: Axe Knight
description: A heavy knight variant using powerful axe throws.

name: Ctulhu
description: A demon apprentice of dark magic.

name: Bone Archer
description: A skeleton armed with a bow and arrows.

name: Bone Pillar
description: The skulls of a large dinosaur animated by magic.

name: Doppleganger10
description: A shape-shifter that has taken Alucard's form.

name: Owl
description: A bird of prey that attacks from the air.

name: Phantom Skull
description: An enormous floating skull that haunts the castle.

name: Scylla Wyrm
description: A giant snake-like creature that guards its mistress, Scylla.

name: Skeleton Ape
description: An animated ape skeleton that throws barrels at intruders.

name: Spear Guard
description: An armored warrior wielding a long-reaching spear.

name: Spellbook
description: An animated book of beginner's spells permeated by dark power.

name: Winged Guard
description: A skeleton guard empowered with wings for aerial attacks.

name: Ectoplasm
description: The physical manifestation of bodiless tormented souls.

name: Sword Lord
description: A knight-like warrior that wields a massive greatsword.

name: Toad
description: A magically enlarged toad created by a demonic baptism.

name: Armor Lord
description: A massive giant sentinel with formidable defense.

name: Corner Guard
description: An armored guard tasked with protecting key passages.

name: Dhuron
description: A headless swordsman known as a Dullahan skeleton.

name: Frog
description: A giant frog lurking in wet areas.

name: Frozen Shade
description: A ghostly figure with power over ice.

name: Magic Tome
description: An animated spellbook floating in the library.

name: Skull Lord
description: A giant flaming skull spirit that travels through walls.

name: Black Crow
description: A flesh-eating raven that strikes from above.

name: Blue Raven
description: The spirit of a long-dead blue raven.

name: Corpseweed
description: A half-living plant, half-zombie that has grown upon a grave.

name: Flail Guard
description: A skeleton guard equipped with a spiked iron flail.

name: Flea Rider
description: A Flea Man riding a battle-trained armor.

name: Spectral Sword
description: An evil demon-possessed sword that summons other weapons to fight.

name: Bone Halberd
description: A skeleton armed with a long halberd (naginata).

name: Scylla
description: A mythological sea monster with a woman's torso and dog-headed limbs.

name: Hunting Girl
description: The invisible spirit of a huntress that can only be seen by her sword.

name: Mudman
description: An animated mud golem summoned by dark magic.

name: Owl Knight
description: A heavily armored knight that commands a trained owl in combat.

name: Spectral Sword
description: A more powerful variant of the demon-possessed sword.

name: Vandal Sword
description: A possessed sword that is said to be the essence of a master swordsman.

name: Flea Armor
description: A heavily armored Flea Man that wields a battle axe.

name: Hippogryph
description: A mythological creature with the front of an eagle and the back of a horse.

name: Paranthropus
description: A giant skeleton wielding a huge, ancient bone.

name: Slime
description: An amorphous blob of acidic, green slime.

name: Blade Master
description: A skeleton that has mastered the art of the blade.

name: Wereskeleton
description: An agile skeleton with the feral strength of a werewolf.

name: Grave Keeper
description: An undead guardian protecting the resting places of the dead.

name: Gremlin
description: A small, fire-breathing demon that causes chaos.

name: Harpy
description: A bird monster with the upper body of a woman.

name: Minotaurus
description: A powerful half-man, half-bull beast wielding a massive axe.

name: Werewolf
description: A savage lycanthrope that attacks with primal ferocity.

name: Bone Ark
description: A portable skull shrine carried by skeleton priests.

name: Valhalla Knight
description: A bloodthirsty undead knight who eternally seeks combat.

name: Cloaked Knight
description: A mysterious knight cloaked in darkness that can fly.

name: Fishhead
description: The reanimated head of a giant fish that guards the waters.

name: Lesser Demon
description: A short, magic-wielding demon that summons demonic allies.

name: Lossoth
description: A creature that searches among graves and knows much wise lore.

name: Salem Witch
description: The spectral remains of a witch from the Salem trials.

name: Blade
description: The eldest of the giant brothers who wields two huge daggers.

name: Gurkha
description: One of the giant brothers who wields a deadly gurkha knife.

name: Hammer
description: One of the giant brothers who uses a massive steel hammer.

name: Discus Lord
description: An armored knight that attacks by throwing a massive discus.

name: Karasuman
description: A demon lord that commands crows and attacks with lightning.

name: Large Slime
description: A giant, brownish mass of acidic gel that leaps at intruders.

name: Hellfire Beast
description: A thunder-wielding demon known as the Musician from Hell.

name: Cerberos
description: The legendary three-headed watchdog of Hell.

name: Killer Fish
description: A large, carnivorous and highly agile fish creature.

name: Olrox
description: A powerful vampire lord who rules a vast section of the castle.

name: Succubus
description: A seductive female demon who attacks victims in their dreams.

name: Tombstone
description: A gravestone possessed by an evil spirit of the dead.

name: Venus Weed
description: A beautiful but deadly plant watered with human blood.

name: Lion
description: The cowardly lion from the forbidden part of the library.

name: Scarecrow
description: A man of straw impaled on a spear, seeking a brain.

name: Granfaloon
description: A nightmarish creature composed of many human bodies.

name: Schmoo
description: A floating disembodied head that flies erratically.

name: Tin Man
description: A heartless tin man that is impervious to some attacks.

name: Balloon Pod
description: Holds countless poison seeds within its body.

name: Yorick
description: A skeleton eternally chasing its own skull. 'Alas, poor Yorick!'

name: Bomb Knight
description: A heavily armored knight that attacks with explosive iron balls.

name: Flying Zombie
description: A zombie that continues to attack even when sliced in half.

name: Bitterfly
description: A mutated insect that is visible only to magic-users.

name: Jack O'Bones
description: A spectral skeleton expert at throwing various weapons.

name: Archer
description: A skeletal archer with fiendishly accurate aim.

name: Werewolf
description: A faster and more savage version of the common werewolf.

name: Black Panther
description: A dark cat that moves with supernatural speed and grace.

name: Darkwing Bat
description: A massive vampire bat that rules the inverted clock tower.

name: Dragon Rider
description: A skeleton rider mounted upon a fierce bone dragon.

name: Minotaur
description: A powerful half-man, half-bull with immense physical strength.

name: Nova Skeleton
description: A skeleton equipped with a terminal energy beam weapon.

name: Orobourous
description: A giant draconic skeleton that guards the castle depths.

name: White Dragon
description: The spectral remains of a massive dragon, fixed in place.

name: Fire Warg
description: A feral wolf imbued with the destructive power of fire.

name: Rock Knight
description: An armored knight that uses rocks as heavy projectiles.

name: Sniper of Goth
description: A high-ranking angelic archer with deadly marksmanship.

name: Spectral Sword
description: An evil blade possessed by a powerful demonic entity.

name: Ghost Dancer
description: Spectral remains that attack with light, fluid steps.

name: Warg Rider
description: A skeletal warrior perched upon a powerful, fire-breathing Warg.

name: Cave Troll
description: A savage, blood-drinking creature that feeds on the unwary.

name: Dark Octopus
description: A giant, ink-spewing cephalopod adapted to the dark caverns.

name: Fire Demon
description: A high-ranking demon wreathed in eternal, hellish flames.

name: Gorgon
description: A massive, armor-plated beast that can turn victims to stone.

name: Malachi
description: A gruesome high-level demon from the deepest pits of Hell.

name: Akmodan II
description: An ancient Egyptian mummy brought back by dark magic.

name: Blue Venus Weed
description: A mutation of the Venus Weed fed with the blood of demons.

name: Doppleganger 40
description: A powerful shape-shifter mirroring Alucard's high-level form.

name: Medusa
description: One of the three Gorgon sisters, her gaze turns all to stone.

name: The Creature
description: An artificial life-form created by a mad scientist.

name: Fake Grant
description: A zombie impersonating Grant Danasty to deceive Alucard.

name: Fake Trevor
description: A zombie impersonating Trevor Belmont to deceive Alucard.

name: Imp
description: A mischievous little demon that can take control of its victims.

name: Fake Sypha
description: A zombie impersonating Sypha Belnades to deceive Alucard.

name: Beelzebub
description: The Lord of the Flies and executioner of deepest Hell.

name: Azaghal
description: A massive executioner demon armed with a deadly blade.

name: Frozen Half
description: A spectral ice spirit that serves the dark lord Galamoth.

name: Salome
description: A young witch who handles cats and powerful magic orbs.

name: Richter Belmont
description: The current master of the Vampire Killer whip.

name: Dodo Bird
description: A legendary rare bird that flees at the first sight of humans.

name: Galamoth
description: A massive demon from the Netherworld with mastery over lightning.

name: Guardian
description: The elite sentinel of the Black Marble Gallery, defensively flawless.

name: Death
description: Dracula's most loyal servant and master of the dark scythe.

name: Shaft
description: The dark priest responsible for the revival of Dracula's castle.

name: Dracula
description: The Lord of Vampires. This is his final, monstrous true form.
